pr_title: Provide details of dependency resolution conflicts

timeline.bodyText: This is fine, but why not just have the resolve method throw the exception?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: There could be multiple conflicts during the resolution, and then a different path will be explored instead of throwing the exception right away. This will just contain the last conflict.
replies.author: hui-yang

timeline.bodyText: String.format instead of concatenation would be preferred I think. Here and elsewhere.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: Let's have a custom to string since the error this is used with will be customer facing.
timeline.author: MikeDombo
